noun.description: An act of dealing a card or cards again.

verb.description: To deal (a card or cards) again. Frequently figurative or in figurative context.

origin: Early 19th century. From re- + deal. Compare slightly later redeal<br>mid 19th century; earliest use found in Charles Fulke Greville (1794–1865), political and social diarist. From re- + deal.
